message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on a high-quality product at a competitive price. Let me know if this works for you!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, $11,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Let me know if that works for you.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $10,000 is your maximum budget, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,500. This is a great compromise that still benefits both of us. Let me know if this works for you!
